metadata.title: Salaam Cola - Taste the Freedom
metadata.description: Premium halal cola made with passion and purpose. Experience the authentic taste of freedom with Salaam Cola Malaysia.

hero.title: TASTE THE
hero.description: Proudly Malaysian with roots stretching far. The new age approach to refreshing Taste Independence.

lineup.title: Refreshing Can Lineup
lineup.subtitle: Discover our range of premium halal beverages crafted for the conscious consumer

taste.title: TASTE IS EVERYTHING
taste.description: We're fundamentally a F&B company with a commitment to ethical refreshment. Our products are crafted for the conscious consumer who values quality and purpose.

change.title: CHANGE STARTS SMALL
change.description: Be part of something bigger. Every purchase contributes to meaningful change in communities across Malaysia. Your choice matters.

trade.title: Trade Enquiries
trade.description: Become a stockist and join our growing network of retailers across Malaysia. Partner with us to bring refreshing change to your customers.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to Our Newsletter
newsletter.subtitle: Get 10% off your first purchase and stay updated with exclusive offers
newsletter.privacy: By subscribing, you agree to our Privacy Policy
newsletter.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

mission.title: TASTE IS EVERYTHING
mission.description: We're fundamentally a F&B company with a commitment to ethical refreshment. Our products are crafted for the conscious consumer who values quality and purpose. The beverage itself? It's awesome, of course.

impact.title: GIVING POWER TO PEOPLE
impact.subtitle: Choose where profits flow
impact.description: Every sip supports communities. We believe in making a difference, one bottle at a time. Your choice matters.

footer.missionText: To provide premium halal beverages while supporting communities and promoting ethical business practices across Malaysia.

hero.title: Where Your
hero.description: Every bottle of Salaam Cola contributes to meaningful change. 10% of our profits support global humanitarian causes.

globalMission.title: Global Mission
globalMission.description1: Salaam Cola was founded on the principle of 'Purposeful Consumption.' We connect with people who think and care deeply about what they consume.
globalMission.description2: Our core value is built on a cycle of kindness. With every purchase, you're not just enjoying a refreshing drink – you're contributing to humanitarian efforts around the world.

malaysia.title: MALAYSIA: SERVING THE HOME TEAM
malaysia.description: While we think globally, we act locally. Here's how Salaam Cola is making a difference right here in Malaysia.
malaysia.youthHangoutsDesc: Supporting youth programs and community centers across Malaysia.
malaysia.mosquesDesc: Contributing to mosques and orphanages in local communities.
malaysia.grassrootsDesc: Direct support to families and individuals in need.

hero.title: Join the
hero.description: Whether you want to distribute Salaam Cola or build your career with us, we're excited to hear from you.

distribute.title: Distribute Salaam Cola
distribute.description: Bring purposeful refreshment to your customers. Partner with us to stock Malaysia's favorite ethical cola brand.

retail.title: Retail Partner
retail.description: Stock Salaam Cola in your store, supermarket, or convenience outlet. Join our growing network of retail partners.

business.title: Business Partner
business.description: Serve Salaam Cola in your restaurant, cafe, or food service business. Perfect for F&B establishments.

corporate.title: Corporate Partner
corporate.description: Bulk orders for events, offices, or corporate gifting. Make a statement with purpose-driven refreshments.

career.title: Build Your Career With Us
career.description1: Join a team that's making a difference. At Salaam Cola, we're not just selling beverages – we're building a movement for ethical consumption.
career.description2: We're always looking for passionate individuals who share our values and want to contribute to something meaningful.
career.applicationSuccess: Thank you for your interest. We'll review your application and get back to you soon.

contact.title: Have Questions?
contact.description: Our team is ready to assist with any inquiries about distribution, partnerships, or career opportunities.
